statements: UPDATE game_events SET event_name = 'Event 1', event_type = 'Casual', challenge_description = 'Complete 10 levels', reward_description = 'Unlock new character' WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE game_events SET reward_description = 'Get exclusive skin', challenge_description = 'Defeat boss in level 5', event_type = 'Boss Fight', event_name = 'Epic Battle' WHERE event_id = 2;
UPDATE game_events SET event_name = 'Race Event', challenge_description = 'Complete a race track in under 2 minutes' WHERE event_id = 1;
UPDATE game_events SET reward_description = 'Unlock a special vehicle' WHERE event_name = 'Challenge Event';
UPDATE challenges SET challenge_description = 'Updated description' WHERE challenge_id = 1;
UPDATE rewards SET reward_name = 'New Reward' WHERE reward_id = 2;
UPDATE challenges SET challenge_name = 'New Challenge Name', challenge_description = 'Updated Description' WHERE challenge_id = 1;
UPDATE rewards SET reward_name = 'New Reward Name', reward_description = 'Updated Reward Description', challenge_id = 2 WHERE reward_id = 3;
UPDATE challenges SET challenge_name = 'New Challenge Name', challenge_description = 'Updated Description' WHERE challenge_id = 1;
UPDATE rewards SET reward_value = 1000 WHERE reward_id = 3;
UPDATE challenges SET challenge_difficulty = 3 WHERE challenge_id = 1;
UPDATE rewards SET reward_value = 50, reward_type = 'Gold' WHERE player_id = 5 AND challenge_id = 1;
UPDATE challenges SET difficulty_level = 'Intermediate' WHERE challenge_id = 1
UPDATE rewards SET is_claimed = TRUE, reward_value = 50.00 WHERE reward_id = 5
UPDATE challenges SET difficulty_level = 'Hard', end_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE challenge_id = 1;
UPDATE rewards SET reward_value = 1500.50, is_claimed = TRUE WHERE challenge_id = 2;
UPDATE challenges SET challenge_name = 'New Challenge Name' WHERE challenge_id = 1;
UPDATE rewards SET reward_amount = 1000, reward_type = 'Gold' WHERE reward_id = 3;
UPDATE challenges SET challenge_name = 'Updated Challenge', game_id = 2, created_at = '2022-10-20 12:00:00' WHERE challenge_id = 1;
UPDATE rewards SET reward_name = 'Diamond Reward', reward_type = 'Special', reward_amount = 500 WHERE reward_id = 3;
